unnormalised: Okay, so these smart meters, eh? Heard they're rolling them out in Bangalore now. Wonder if they'll actually help with those crazy electricity bills! Remember last Diwali, my neighbor, Mrs. Sharma, was complaining about how much she had to pay. Hope this stops the meter walas from randomly adding Rs. 500 extra! Let's see if it beats the power cuts during Onam too. My biryani needs consistent electricity! Wish them success like ISRO!
normalised: Okay, so these smart meters, eh? Heard they are rolling them out in Bengaluru now. Wonder if they will actually help with those crazy electricity bills! Remember last Diwali, my neighbor, Missus Sharma, was complaining about how much she had to pay. Hope this stops the meter walas from randomly adding five hundred rupees extra! Let us see if it beats the power cuts during Onam too. My biryani needs consistent electricity! Wish them success like I S R O!
